Package com.cs546.backend.core.config

Class CityConfigurer

java.lang.Object
com.cs546.backend.core.config.CityConfigurer
@Configuration
public class CityConfigurer
extends java.lang.Object
Initial Configuration that is required to set up the city and GameState.

    Creates a GameState object with the specified city size.
    static void deleteGeneratedFilesAndDirectories()
    Deletes temporary files and directories used to keep track of city history during the simulation.
    static java.util.Date getDate()
    Returns the date at which the simulation was started.
    static java.lang.String getHistoryFilePath()
    Returns the file where the city history is stored permanently.
    static java.nio.file.Path getHistoryPath()
    Returns the path where the history files are stored permanently.
    static java.nio.file.Path getTemporaryHistoryPath()
    Returns the temporary path used to store history files during the simulation.
    static void init()
    Creates temporary directory where history files will be stored.
